column4: I have a filename -0395e722, when i do rm -0395e722. it gives me the error invalid option -0. Anyway to fix this?
prefix the hyphen with a \     or enclose the entire name in single-quotes
find . -maxdepth 1 -name '\-*'  ... if that correctly identifies only the files you want to delete... add " -delete" to the command line
